name: Trigger Zap
description:
Description

Trigger Zap is a Rage-Inducing Platform game where you use your gun to escape the world's largest weapon facility!

You are a gun collector trying to find prototype weapons from all over the world - and you stumbled upon a unique weapon - the real railgun! However, the gun is still in its early stages and has some... flaws, that eventually help you, the player, escape the world's largest weapon facility! What flaws you might ask? Well, you have to find it out yourself... 

Hint: You need to go up, not down.

Controls

Move mouse to aim
Left-click to shoot
Press R to reload
Press Esc to pause
